titles.title: White As Snow, White As Snow

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
White as snow, white as snow.
Though my sins were as scarlet,
Lord I know, Lord I know,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am clean and forgiven.
Through the power of Your blood,
And the wonders of your love,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Through faith in You I know
That I can be white as snow.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Como la nieve, limpio soy.
He sido libre de el pecado.
Señor, yo sé, Señor, yo sé,
He sido limpio y perdonado,
Por el poder que hay en Tu sangre,
Y la grandeza de Tu amor,
Por mi fe en Ti, Señor,
Limpio soy, como la nieve.
